About ME

I am a tech enthusiast and an eager learner, Specializing in frontend and backend development. Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects. I have diverse set of skills, ranging from design, to HTML + CSS + Javascript, and mastered many libraries and frameworks like Bootstrap, JQuery, SemanticUi, React etc.

My stack is MERN ( MongoDB - Express - React - NodeJs ). I have gained my skills through online resources like Udemy, FreeCodeCamp, Udacity, Edx, books, blogs and by practice. 🎓

As a web developer, I enjoy my obsessive attention to detail and adequate problem solving skills.

Some of my projects

Natours

A travel agency website developed using pure CSS with Sass. Features some advanced CSS 3 animations.

Trillo

A Hotel website developed using CSS,Sass and Javascript. Used Flexbox for layout and added some advanced CSS 3 animations.

RGB Color Game

A fun RGB color game. Made by CSS,HTML and of course javascript.

Simple To Do list

A simple to do list without any backend, used only JQuery. Best for daily tasks.

Patatab Clone

A fun Javascript Project. Used HTML 5 Convas for some drawing and paper.js. Make sure to check this one out. 😁

YelpCamp

YelpCamp is a big project that list all campgrounds that users added. Developed using Node.js(Express), MongoDB and some external packages. Has a local authentication implemented by passport.js, and express-session.

Complex To do list

A complex To do list web app that can add multi-level tasks. Used Node.js, MongoDB, AJAX, JQuery, Bootstarp 4, etc. Best for long-term/short-term goals and plans. 😎
